import React from "react"; import { MapIcon, QrCodeIcon, RocketLaunchIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; import manWithPhone from '../../Assets/manWithScooter/scooter-rental-2.JPG'; import './About.scss' const features = [ { name: "Locate", description: "Using a simple app on your smartphone, find a scooter nearby. With real-time tracking, finding a scooter is as easy as checking your phone.", icon: MapIcon, }, { name: "Scan", description: "Once you've found your scooter, unlocking it is a breeze. Simply open the app and scan the QR code on the scooter to unlock it and start your ride", icon: QrCodeIcon, }, { name: "Ride", description: "You're all set! Hop on the scooter and ride. Enjoy the freedom of mobility. When you're done, park the scooter responsibly and end your ride on the app. It's that simple!", icon: RocketLaunchIcon, }, ]; export default function About() { return (

Get Started

How it Works?

{features.map((feature) => (
{feature.name}
{" "}
{feature.description}
))}
); }
